title: Am I the only Kog'Maw who rushes Trinity Force first ?
body:
So, I always see everyone rush guinsoos, runes hurricane the normal God'Maw build. But then theres me, I rush phage then sheen then into Trinity Force. I personally think it gives you a great amount of sustain, and tons of damage.



My build is; Trinity Force, Blade of Ruined King, Bloodthirster, Mortal Reminder, Berserker Greaves and Infinity Edge.

replies.body:
Why would you build that on kog'maw?

Pick any other caster ADC and play it on them instead.
Ur wrong. Since his w is reworked. Its best to go guinsoo which gives him some ap boost and since kog stak up insu rage so fast. Tf defintely used to be first item i pick up b4 rework
what sustain is triforce giving you???
The popular on-hit build is currently the most effective way to play Kog'Maw in most scenarios. But, whatever works for you I guess
yeah if your playing adc kog, Trinity might be good for scaling later but you need to max out your AD, I would probably go into Botrk first, or even Shiv if your need for farming.

> Trinity might be good for scaling later but you need to max out your AD

trinity force is undoubtedly the least effective "scaling" item in the game. it is not good on kogmaw anymore and it especially doesnt help with anyones scaling into the late game, especially kogmaws. also what is this maxing out of your AD? is this like 6 mercurial scimitars, or 6 trinity forces for the best scaling into the late game

The issue with trinity force in your build is that there isn't much AD to work with anyways and Kogmaw isn't that good at weaving spells between auto attacks since the majority of the time when he's close up to his target his generally only going to press W.
I don't like triforce anymore.  More like bi-force. Amirite?
Statistically its doubtful that you're the only one.
